textContent:
Last night you mentioned your clear and deeply held need to feel you're building something...together...with a partner. I get it and understand so deeply.  

I understand you saying you want to feel your investments of time, affection and intimacy will pay back.

And, I feel you feeling alone, feeling all the feels, and wanting and needing support, affection and comfort/safety...to be held bc life is hard, stressful, and sad. you don't have a way to meet these needs outside of our relationship today, nor can neccecarily see a way towards getting there, making it all that much more sad and painful. 

Does this feel alive in you, and accurate?  


We are building something together, and have been.
textContentHtml:
Last night you mentioned your clear and deeply held need to feel you're building something...together...with a partner. I get it and understand so deeply.  


I understand you saying you want to feel your investments of time, affection and intimacy will pay back.


And, I feel you feeling alone, feeling all the feels, and wanting and needing support, affection and comfort/safety...to be held bc life is hard, stressful, and sad. you don't have a way to meet these needs outside of our relationship today, nor can neccecarily see a way towards getting there, making it all that much more sad and painful. 


Does this feel alive in you, and accurate?  



We are building something together, and have been.
